subtitleNullable: Albanian Fake News Corpus taken from the 'Albanian fake news detection' paper
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset was derived from the publication 'Albanian fake news detection' by ERCAN CANHASI, REXHEP SHIJAKU, and ERBLIN BERISHA. Their GitHub Repository can be found at this [URL](https://github.com/rexshijaku/alb-fake-news-corpus).


### Content

This dataset is made up of a small corpus of news that the authors of the study manually assessed as fake or not. Figure 1 depicts the entire corpus formation process:

![Process of building the Alb-Fake-News-Corpus](https://i.imgur.com/8vD8DjM.png)


### Inspiration

I was delighted to discover the authors' work and wanted to publish it in a DataFrame-friendly style so that others may build on it.

This dataset is made up of a small corpus of news that the authors of the study manually assessed as fake or not. Figure 1 depicts the entire corpus formation process:
